entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High plus 2.
